meanings.definition: Lacking a specific purpose or use.
meanings.sent1: The broken toy was functionless and sat in the corner.
meanings.sent2: The old, rusty key was functionless and no longer opened any doors.
meanings.sent3: The functionless umbrella tried to shade the sun, but failed miserably.
meanings.sent4: Her functionless phone felt like a useless brick in her pocket.
meanings.sent5: The functionless machine sputtered and died, unable to complete its task.

meanings.definition: Not performing a specific task or role.
meanings.sent1: The tired robot stood functionless in the corner of the room.
meanings.sent2: The functionless computer screen displayed only a blank, white page.
meanings.sent3: The functionless clock decided to take a break and stopped ticking.
meanings.sent4: His functionless car refused to start, leaving him stranded on the road.
meanings.sent5: The functionless remote control failed to change the channel, much to his frustration.
